synergyviewcore.timebar.render

Class TimeBarSegmentIntervalRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jaret.util.ui.timebars.swt.renderer.RendererBase
      • synergyviewcore.timebar.render.TimeBarSegmentIntervalRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.jaret.util.ui.timebars.swt.renderer.TimeBarRenderer

    public class TimeBarSegmentIntervalRenderer
extends de.jaret.util.ui.timebars.swt.renderer.RendererBase
implements de.jaret.util.ui.timebars.swt.renderer.TimeBarRenderer
    Customised Interval Renderer that allows developers to define gradient-enabled background colour.
